extracted_playbook.title: Identify Installed Version of Ivanti Endpoint Management
extracted_playbook.description: Check the installed version of Ivanti Endpoint Management software to determine if it is prior to version 2022 Service Update 5.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the installed version prior to 2022 Service Update 5?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Ivanti Endpoint Management 2022 Service Update 5
extracted_playbook.description: Update the Ivanti Endpoint Management software to version 2022 Service Update 5 to mitigate the vulnerability.

affected_products: Ivanti Endpoint Management software (EPM) prior to version 2022 Service Update 5
